rules_text:
When this creature enters, create an implant with a +1/+1 counter and a haste counter. [i](It’s a token artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery”)[/i]
Modified creatures you control can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

OG_5:
When MV4 Rhinodrone Piker enters, choose one —
• Put a haste or a +1/+1 counter on MV4 Rhinodrone Piker.
• Put a haste and a +1/+1 counter on target artifact.
Modified creatures you control can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

OG_4:
When MV4 Modman enters, put a haste counter on target artifact you control.
Modified creatures you control can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.


OG_3: Costed 3G
When MV4 Modman enters the battlefield, put a vigilance counter and a +1/+1 counter on target artifact you control.
Modified creatures you control can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

OG_2: Costed 1GG
When MV3 Modman enters the battlefield, put a vigilance counter and a +1/+1 counter on target artifact you control.
Modified creatures you control have ward 1.

OG_1:
When MV3 Modman enters the battlefield, create an implant with a vigilance counter and a +1/+1 counter. (It’s a token artifact with “1, T, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery”)
Modified creatures you control have ward 1.
